meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive George McAleese Amanda Steadman Andy Hermann Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6594.

td.p: George McAleese, a political researcher from Washington, D.C.
Amanda Steadman, a director of underwriting policy from Winnipeg, Manitoba
Andy Hermann, a website producer from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,000)

tr.td: NOAH'S ARC
GREEN WITH NON-ENVY
HOME LAND
PUT YOUR MONEY WHERE YOUR MOUTH IS
LET'S GOLF!
HERE'S YOUR T OFF TIME
(Alex: Each correct response in that category will be two words.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Amanda: What is 150?)
(Andy: What is 50?)

500

AndyAmandaGeorge
')
